children.title: Get Started with Remix PWA
children.description: Remix PWA is a compiler that bundles your service workers as well as provide utilities and modules to build your application.

children.title: Upgrade Guide
children.description: Learn how to upgrade to your Remix PWA App to v3.0

children.title: Contribute
children.description: Learn how you can contribute to the Remix PWA Ecosystem.

children.title: Community
children.description: Communities are the heart of the open source movement. Find out how you can get involved with Remix community and join in on the action.

children.title: FAQ
children.description: Frequently asked questions about Remix PWA.

children.title: Resources
children.description: Extra resources to help you get started with Remix PWA and PWAs in general.

children.title: Technical Explanantion
children.description: An technical explanantion of Remix PWA v3.0 internals

children.title: Packages
children.description: An overview of all the new packages that ships with Remix PWA v3

children.title: defaultFetchHandler
children.description: Default handler for fetch requests in the worker

children.title: errorHandler
children.description: Error Handling in Remix PWA

children.title: getLoadContext
children.description: Global context object for the worker thread.

children.title: workerAction
children.description: Worker-only handlers for non-GET requests

children.title: workerLoader
children.description: workerLoader

children.title: LiveReload
children.description: Remix PWA LiveReload Component

children.title: useSWEffect
children.description: useSWEffect is a React hook exported from the @remix-pwa/sw package that updates the Service Worker with changes in the main thread.

children.title: Background Sync
children.description: Background Sync allows you to defer actions until the user has stable connectivity. This is useful for ensuring that whatever the user wants to send, is actually sent.

children.title: defer
children.description: A utility or creating a streaming/deferred response.

children.title: json
children.description: A utility to create application/json responses

children.title: logger
children.description: A custom, enhanced logger for Remix PWA. Enables beautiful logging in the browser console in only development environments.

children.title: redirect
children.description: A utility to assist with sending 30x responses. Useful for redirects in the browser.

children.title: Configuring with remix.config.js
children.description: Remix configuration file just got a new addition! Read about the hijack and how to upgrade your config file.

children.title: RemixCache
children.description: A wrapper for the browser's Cache API. Use this to cache data in the browser with more control and less-hassle.

children.title: @remix-pwa/dev (CLI)
children.description: Remix PWA CLI comes with the @remix-pwa/dev package. It also ships with the compiler, as well as templates for creating new Remix PWA projects. Let's explore the CLI in this section.

children.title: @remix-pwa/{runtime}
children.description: @remix-pwa/{runtime}
